title: Geography (Japan): Landmarks (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the Landmarks subcategory within Geography (Japan). Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: The Atomic Bomb Dome in Hiroshima is the symbol of the people's wish for peace.
cards.romaji: Hiroshima no genbaku d mu wa, hitobito no heiwa o negau kimochi no sh ch desu.
cards.japanese: 広島の原爆ドームは、人々の平和を願う気持ちの象徴です。
